channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Aussie regulator flagged concerns about FTX months before collapse: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: Australia’s financial regulator raised concerns about FTX Australia not long after it began operations in March 2022, according to documents.

item.title: Bitcoin stays out of fear for 11 straight days as price tips near 24K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Bitcoin's huge price surge in January has meant that 64% of Bitcoin investors are in profit, according to data from IntoTheBlock.

item.title: Panama’s Supreme Court to rule on cryptocurrency legislation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The high court will now decide whether to declare the “crypto bill” unenforceable or to approve it with modifications.

item.title: LTC, AVAX, APT and FTM prepare to rally as Bitcoin price targets $24K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin bulls look to push BTC price to $24,000 and in doing so, LTC, AVAX, APT and FTM could extend their monthly gains.

item.title: North Korean hackers try to launder $27M in ETH from Harmony bridge attack
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Three main addresses sent 17,278 Ether to six exchanges, which managed to freeze at least some of the stolen funds.

item.title: Bitcoin eyes $25K as BTC price nears best weekly close in 5 months
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin bulls have everything to play for as the weekly and monthly closes decide what could be Bitcoin’s best January in ten years.

item.title: South Korea to deploy cryptocurrency tracking system in 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: The “Virtual Currency Tracking System” will be used to monitor transaction history, extract information related to transactions and check the source of funds before and after remittance.

item.title: Yuga Labs co-founder to take leave of absence due to health reasons
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Aronow said he would still contribute as a board member and strategic adviser. However, his priority will be getting the best medical treatment he can to recover fully.

item.title: FTX creditors list, BlockFi $1.2B exposure and new Celsius token: Hodler’s Digest, Jan. 22-28
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Editorial Staff
item.description: FTX will be the subject of a U.S. Senate hearing, authorities take HashFlare founders into custody and New York finalizes its PoW ban.

item.title: Core Scientific files motion to sell over $6M in Bitmain coupons
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: A court filing shows that some conditions apply to the coupons, making them useless for Core Scientific’s business.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried seeks to access FTX funds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Sam Bankman-Fried’s lawyers claim he was not involved in previous unauthorized transactions and should have access to company assets.

item.title: Genesis Capital’s fall might transform crypto lending — not bury it
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Singer
item.description: TradFi firms with expertise in risk management may soon “fill the void” left by bankrupt crypto lenders, a Duke finance professor predicts.

item.title: US gov’t $1.5T debt interest will be equal 3X Bitcoin market cap in 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: The U.S. will pay over $1 trillion in debt interest next year, the equivalent of three or more Bitcoin market caps at current prices.

item.title: IRS reminds taxpayers of crypto income reporting ahead of 2022 filing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: The IRS’s recommendation to check “Yes” boils down to receiving, earning, transferring or selling cryptocurrencies for any monetary benefit, including mining and staking.

item.title: Bitcoin ‘so bullish’ at $23K as analyst reveals new BTC price metrics
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Market analyst Cole Garner suggests that Bitcoin bulls are in for a treat amid an ongoing BTC price renaissance.

item.title: CZ predicts ‘existential implications’ for anti-crypto traditional finance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: While the reluctance of traditional players is a deterrent to crypto’s adoption in the short term, CZ argues that the decision might backfire over the next two decades.

item.title: White House cryptocurrency ‘roadmap’ recommends against pension funds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The Biden administration touted its comprehensive framework and encouraged regulators and Congress to tighten the screws on crypto in a new statement.

item.title: US prosecutors seek to ban SBF from Signal after alleged witness contact
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: It’s alleged that the former FTX CEO attempted to arrange a “constructive relationship” with the current General Counsel of FTX US, Ryne Miller.

item.title: Silvergate suspends dividends to preserve ‘highly liquid balance sheet’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: January has been a rough month for Silvergate, with the dividend halts coming just a few weeks after it announced a Q4 2022 loss of $1 billion and laid off 200 employees.

item.title: Hackers take over Azuki’s Twitter account, steal over $750K in less than 30 minutes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: Most of the funds stolen were from a single wallet, with $751,321.80 in USDC drained from the malicious link.

item.title: California DMV to digitize car title management system via Tezos
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: California DMV’s chief digital officer, Ajay Gupta, emphasized that the agency is looking to modernize its current systems and bring greater transparency to car title transfers.

item.title: Total crypto market cap rises above $1T — data suggests more upside is in store
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Bad news continues to dominate crypto media headlines, but Bitcoin and the broader market appear not to care.

item.title: Fed policy to align bank oversight could limit crypto activities by state banks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The new policy would align the allowable activities for insured and uninsured state banks and OCC-supervised national banks by making rules for state banks more restrictive.

item.title: 5 reasons why the Aptos (APT) rally could still have wings
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: Aptos’ star-studded founders and the market’s disbelief in the rally could further fuel the rise in APT price.

item.title: Aave deploys v3 on Ethereum after 10 months of testing on other networks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The new version includes features developers believe will increase capital efficiency and lower gas fees.

item.title: Price analysis 1/27: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, MATIC, DOT, LTC, AVAX
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and select altcoins continue to consolidate near their recent highs, increasing the possibility of an upside breakout.

item.title: New Ripple president says her job is to continue to scale amid crypto winter
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Veteran Ripple executive and former general manager Monica Long said the company has seen record growth in recent months despite the crypto winter.

item.title: TradFi and DeFi come together at Davos 2023: Finance Redefined
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Decentralized finance meets its traditional counterpart at Davos, with a growing cross-pollination between the two.

item.title: New York Assembly introduces crypto payments bill for fines, taxes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The bill clarifies that state agencies can legally agree to accept cryptocurrency payments and that these agreements should be enforced by the courts.

item.title: Opinion: 3 tips for trading Ethereum this year
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Daniel O'Keeffe
item.description: It’s a hard year to trade, but there are measures you can take to increase the likelihood you’ll succeed if you want to trade Ether.
